name: Lie Detective (Misspeld Games)
description:
I made this game for the Community Game Jam

Theme: The Game is a Liar

You found the bomb
You caught the terrorist
But the bomb is still active!

Cut the right wire to defuse the bomb.
The terrorist will tell you which wire to cut,
but don't believe everything he says!

The terrorist is hooked up to a polygraph lie detector which indicates whether he is lying or telling the truth. You have 60 seconds to figure out which wire to cut and defuse the bomb.

Press 'R' to try again.

Disclaimer: I did not prioritize the game jam this week, but I really wanted to make something. This means the game has no replayability. I might or might not work more on this in the future.
